fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Mark up to two players each day with different colors.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players that are marked with the correct color will fall unconscious and be unable to talk or perform their abilities for the next night and day.
- Players that are incorrectly marked will be informed that a Sharpie drew on them.
- You do not know whether or not a player was correctly marked.
- When all living players (excluding Biohazards) are correctly marked, no one except Biohazards will be able to perform abilities until you die.
Colors:
- Red: Affects Good (Killing) roles
- Orange: Affects Good (Power) and Good (Other) roles
- Yellow: Affects Good (Protective) roles
- Green: Affects Good (Support) roles
- Blue: Affects opposing REFs
- Purple: Affects Neutrals
